text: Mathieu Gonçalves (born 8 June 2001) is a French professional footballer who plays as a defender for Toulouse FC. ==Professional career== Gonçalves made his professional debut for Toulouse FC in a 4–0 Ligue 1 loss to Paris Saint- Germain F.C. on 25 August 2019. ==Personal life== Born in France, Gonçalves is of Portuguese descent. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Toulouse Profile Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Paris Category:French footballers Category:France youth international footballers Category:French people of Portuguese descent Category:Toulouse FC players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Association football defenders
title: Mathieu Gonçalves
